H0.text: The four town halls in Kirklees that contain concert venues are in Huddersfield, Cleckheaton, Dewsbury and which other town. Mirfield

H1.text: The four town halls in Kirklees that contain concert venues are in Huddersfield, Cleckheaton, Dewsbury and which other town. Holmfirth

H2.text: The four town halls in Kirklees that contain concert venues are in Huddersfield, Cleckheaton, Dewsbury and which other town. Meltham

H3.text: The four town halls in Kirklees that contain concert venues are in Huddersfield, Cleckheaton, Dewsbury and which other town. Batley

A4.text: Holmfirth Choral Society hold regular classical choral music concerts in Holmfirth Civic Hall
